title: Beyond the Horror: Apocalypse Episode 7
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: If Michael is so powerful, i wonder why he couldn’t bring Meade back to life.  Like did he use up all of his favors with Satan when he went to get Misty?  I can’t wait to see why he had to make her into a robot.

The most interesting thing to me about this episode was when Mallory saved Coco. In another episode when Mallory saved the deer, myrtle said she didn’t heal the wounds, she undid them. I’m not sure but I think this is hinting that Mallory has time powers and maybe she might be able to reverse the apocalypse and stop it.
There is a part of me that believes Coco maybe the next supreme, and Mallory may be an Alien or a reincarnated Christ.

Telekinesis is the ability to move objects with your mind. Bubbles McGee has a power similar to Nan's telepathy, which is called Vlentio Animo and is the ability to read the soul of another individual.
hey there was a lot of heart eatting this season and that is how Scath got the Butcher under her control, then obviously the Blood Moon is important.
